General.Name: Artifex Mundi SA
General.Description: Artifex Mundi S.A. develops and publishes computer games worldwide. It provides approximately 100 game titles for various platforms, including PC and Mac computers; mobile devices comprising smartphones, tablets, and other devices controlled by Android, iOS, and Windows 10 systems; and game consoles, including Xbox One, Xbox Series, PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, and Nintendo Switch. The company was founded in 2006 and is based in Katowice, Poland.

2.Name: Mr. Kamil  Urbanek
2.Title: Publishing Director & Member of the Management Board

3.Name: Przemyslaw  Blaszczyk
3.Title: CEO, CFO & Member of the Management Board
